injuries.further_detail: Feb 21: 'More difficult and different situation because right now he has to prioritise his health. He is in a tough moment; he hasn't even trained once with us because he is having recurring injuries.'

Mar 01: 'Tyler is training with the group, doing almost everything. He’s only been training one week, so it’s not enough. He will probably play [some minutes] with the development squad. He needs to spend some time before returning.'
Jan 31: 'James will be out for about six weeks, I believe, knowing Hilly, though he will try and do it in four weeks! We have been short at full-back, and we know he will work hard to recover.'
Feb 26: 'Lloyd, who was missing the other day, will continue to be missing this game and a little bit more, and that's it.'
Mar 03: 'Ryan wasn't feeling 100 per cent because he has been ill, and he was lacking some energy.'
Mar 03: 'I think it's a clear strain in the hamstring. I hope it's not very big. It's a very bad moment for us, collectively, because we don't have too many defenders right now.'
Jan 24: 'Max is obviously out; he has a muscle injury, and he'll be out for some time.'

Feb 02: 'James is not available. He can't play, he needs, I don’t know how much time. For the next two, three, four games, he can't play.'

Feb 22: 'Unfortunately, it is as bad as we thought. Definitely season over, and maybe for the larger part of this year, he won't feature. He will make a full recovery, and he will be an important player for us in the future.'
Jan 30: 'It's really unlucky for him mostly but also for us. It was a freak incident [in training], but luckily, the doctors have told us he will recover fully, but it's surgery and season over.'
Feb 15: 'He won't be available [for this weekend]; he had surgery on a chronic issue that needed resolving. It's not season over, but he'll certainly miss out for a period of time.'
Feb 08: 'Yes [he is on schedule to return this season], but with a long-term injury, he still has a crucial phase to go through, which is a return to the pitch, and he's not there yet, so we'll see.'

Dec 01: 'It's bad. He's snapped his Achilles tendon, so it's a question of how long that takes [to heal]. It could take as long as the end of the season, but of course, one remains optimistic. It's a massive blow.'

Jan 29: 'So he was operated on - I think it was last Tuesday. I would like to say and think that he could get back before the end of the season. But if he is going to get back, it won't be in the near future.'
Mar 01: 'I hoped he could be in training with us this week, but his knee reacted in a way we didn't like. He visited the doctor one more time. It was better to have the surgery. He's doing well.'

Mar 01: 'We don't know exactly, but we expect him back at the end of March or April [as long as] everything goes well. Maybe after the Int' Break, he can be with us in training. That was his third injury this season, so we'll take care of him.'

Dec 06: 'It's an ACL, ruptured, so that's what I unfortunately expected from the first second. Everything looked like that. Very unfortunate.'

Feb 23: 'Curtis is probably the first one [to come back] around the international break. All the others will be after the international break.'

Mar 01: 'I don't think Mo is too far off, but he will not feature tomorrow, and from there, we have to go. It's like touch and go, but I think next week at any point it is possible. He is on the way back, definitely, but not there yet.'

Feb 27: 'It's a ligament injury, could have been much worse, but bad enough for being ruled out for this game, next game. We will see. So, we need miracles with a few players, so that's why I don't want to rule out for too long.'

Feb 27: 'Yeah, there's no timescale. I don't know, to be honest. It's a couple of things [that] he has to do now from a medical point of view, and then I don't know if that will then mean that he can play again [this season].'

Feb 18: 'We will be dictated to by the medical staff and specialists, but if there was a chance I could play again, then I would love to. It's far too early to say; there are a lot more tests and things that need to happen, but I wouldn't write it off.'

Feb 26: 'He's still in the very early stages of [his recovery], so whether we get him back before the end of the season, it's still very touch and go. He's working hard, but it's all very, very early stages, biking and things like that.'

Mar 01: 'I couldn't talk about it the other day, but he had a nasty hamstring injury in training last week. You watch it back, and it almost looks like nothing, but he'll be out for a while now, unfortunately.'

Mar 01: 'He will not be fit for this weekend. When he will come back, I don’t know. I think he will not be fit [for the upcoming internationals]. He has had a setback; he has to recover well so we can use him as much as possible.'

Feb 15: 'He had setbacks during his rehab process. It takes too long; it's bad for him. Bad for us. But now we've turned a point, and it's positive - he will return soon on the pitch. I don't think then it will take long before he's returning in the team training.'

Feb 23: 'It is a small injury, two to three weeks. That is what happens and the risk [when you are] playing at high intensity, training. As I say, it is not a big injury, but he has to wait for one, two, three weeks'

Mar 02: 'I don't think there's any injury there; it's just tight. It was precautionary, really. Unfortunately, we had no choice but to make sure he was off and safe, and make sure we are strong enough to go again on another day.'
Mar 02: 'I don't know if it was his quad that collided with the post, but he's got some issue, so it may have been from that situation, but he's confident he'll be ok for next weekend.'
